review: We have completely "disabled the cable" and no longer subscribe to TV.  We use netflix and hulu and "buy" current seasons of a few shows from iTunes. Used to have 10 movie channels I didn't watch.  Now we preview movies and if we like them we buy them.  Also great to have internet radio on and playing through the tv system. We also have linked our photo library and let the slide show run randomly while listening to music or just vegging on the couch. People always comment how cool that is.We have 3 apple TVs in the house, are saving a ton of money compared to cable, ADSL or satellite tv.  Not looking back at all.  The only thing missing is live sports but I gotta believe that's gonna happen someday. In the meantime that's my excuse to go to B-dub and get some wings...
author: Ex-Calif
